game.title: The Lost Sword
game.objective: Find and retrieve the legendary sword
game.description: Traverse treacherous terrain and overcome mighty foes to find the forgotten sword of the ancients. Your journey will be perilous, but the reward will be worthwhile.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and the legendary sword

task.objective: Figure out the location of the sword
task.description: Seek wisdom from ancient texts and decipher the cryptic clues to determine the location of the sword.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the sword
task.description: Prepare for battle against the ancient guardian who protects the sword. Only the brave and worthy can defeat him.

task.objective: Bring the sword to the Old Hermit
task.description: Once you have claimed the sword, bring it back to the Old Hermit for final validation and to collect your reward.
